name: Bitcoin Crush
description:
Want to feel like a cryptocurrency miner? Launch this game and see how much you can earn! Break bitcoins with a picker rolling down from platforms and get commission for every succesful collision. Your commission grows as the game progresses and becomes more compicated, so try to survive!

This is my first Unity game created completely from scratch.

Background music: "A Torrent Of Trouble" by Stevia Sphere - https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/album/software-piracy
